old.name: 👶 I was born
old.description: Born in Moscow. Everything is just beginning.
old.insight: The very first event in the timeline — the start of it all.

old.name: 🎮 Dendy and first games
old.description: Got a Dendy console. First exposure to digital technology through games.
old.insight: Games sparked my interest in technology and system interaction.

old.name: 🏃 Roller skates
old.description: Got my first roller skates. Skated for about 10 years, changing pairs — it was a sports passion.
old.insight: Balance, endurance, and love for street sports.

old.name: ⚽ Yard football
old.description: Constant yard matches: balls would burst and wear out, but the games never stopped.
old.insight: Team spirit, excitement, and daily practice.

old.name: 🎮 Sega Mega Drive 2
old.description: First 16-bit console. A classic and a legend: dreamed of becoming a game developer, played everything I could.
old.insight: Passion for games sparked an interest in creating worlds and mechanics.

old.name: ⚽ Football section 'Team-Leader'
old.description: Trained for about 3 years: practices, discipline, first 'official' wins and losses.
old.insight: Learned the importance of consistency and working for results.

old.name: 🕹️ Computer clubs
old.description: LAN battles: StarCraft, Diablo, Counter-Strike, Quake, Heroes, and more.
old.insight: Immersion in competitive games and online culture.

old.name: 🖥️ First computer
old.description: Got my first computer. Eighth grade, the beginning of my IT journey.
old.insight: First experiments with programs, games, and files.

old.name: 🚀 StarCraft
old.description: First online game that became my lifestyle: playing since the 2000s to this day. Tournaments, clans, endless matches.
old.insight: StarCraft — One Love. The game taught strategic thinking and gave me friends I’m still in touch with.

old.name: 📚 Programming books
old.description: Tried to learn Visual Basic, Delphi, 3D Max. Not everything worked out, but got basic knowledge and practice.
old.insight: First steps in coding and tools: understanding logic and interfaces.

old.name: 🌐 Internet and clan
old.description: Got a modem and internet. Online games, creating a clan, wanting to make a website.
old.insight: The desire to express myself online led to learning web technologies.

old.name: 🧩 Dreamweaver
old.description: WYSIWYG editor for website layout — quick start in page creation.
old.insight: Gave the feeling that web pages could be 'built' with both hands and eyes.

old.name: 🧩 HTML and CSS
old.description: Got familiar with HTML and CSS, made a website for my clan.
old.insight: From this point, my path as a web developer began.

old.name: 🖼️ Photoshop
old.description: Optimizing graphics for slow internet, preparing images for the web.
old.insight: Learned the value of optimization and resource weight.

old.name: 📡 Hosting and FTP
old.description: First hosting services: narod.ru, FTP clients, website transfers. Search engine Rambler.
old.insight: Websites became 'alive': deployment, updates, publication.

old.name: ⚡ Flash 5
old.description: Vector graphics and first animations — felt like outer space.
old.insight: Animation revealed the link between design, code, and interaction.

old.name: 💼 First IT job
old.description: Worked at a web studio as a layout designer and account manager. Content filling and website support.
old.insight: First commercial experience, learning internet marketing and SEO.

old.name: 📈 SEO promotion
old.description: Link ranking, semantic layout, content creation, meta tags.
old.insight: Search is about structure, meaning, and quality.

old.name: 🎸 Guitar
old.description: Got a guitar. Since then I’ve been learning to play for 20 years — a lifetime hobby.
old.insight: Playing guitar is about discipline, rhythm, and inspiration.

old.name: 🧑‍💻 Freelance and promotion
old.description: Went into freelance. Design, layout, website promotion. Full cycle for clients.
old.insight: Independence and responsibility for the entire project result.

old.name: 🚵 Mountain bike
old.description: Got a MTB bike. A new passion and freedom of movement — for life.
old.insight: Endurance, routes, technique, and joy of the journey.

old.name: 🃏 Online poker
old.description: Poker career (2009–2012): combined with freelancing. Developed analytical and strategic thinking, but discipline over the long run is critical — eventually left it as an occasional hobby.
old.insight: Lessons in probability, bankroll management, and self-control.

old.name: 🏢 Return to the office
old.description: Returned to the office, started working as a frontend developer in a team.
old.insight: Consolidation of my professional path and growth as a specialist.
